summary: 5 Elvis impersonators stay long after the contest playing poker, when a valuable mask is stolen from the Indian casino. Killers, incl. a sexy, blonde assassin, hunt down the Elvises to get the mask.
cast: Christian Slater|Powers Boothe|Dane Cook|Jeff Fahey|Chris Kattan|Helena Mattsson|Gary Oldman|Megan Park|Sam Trammell|Tony Cox|Anthony Brandon Wong|Matthew Willig|Gordon Tootoosis|Heather Roop|Anthony Azizi|Marc Winnick|Paulina Gretzky|Danny James|Michael Spears|Eddie Spears|Jaci Twiss|Lawrence Dwyer|Tod Huntington|Andrea Pineda|Henry Boger|Jeff Jonas|Alberta Mason|Ron Peterson|Carson Schoenfeld|Shani Klein-Madden|Anthony Tefertiller
title: Guns, Girls and Gambling
